metadata.title: CVE-2021-40592 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: GPAC version before commit 71460d72ec07df766dab0a4d52687529f3efcf0a (version v1.0.1 onwards) contains loop with unreachable exit condition ('infinite loop') vulnerability in ISOBMFF reader filter, isoffin_read.c. Function isoffin_process() can result in DoS by infinite loop. To exploit, the victim must open a specially crafted mp4 file.

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
